meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Janet Russell Jamie Santo Megan Barnes Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6113.

td.p: Janet Russell, a family physician from Scottsdale, Arizona
Jamie Santo, a freelance editor from Wilmington, Delaware
Megan Barnes, a stay-at-home mother from Baltimore, Maryland (whose 1-day cash winnings total $37,601)

tr.td: WHO OWNS WHAT
OLD NAMES FOR MEDICAL CONDITIONS
FAMOUS PAIRS
SONGS IN MUSICALS
WE ALL NEED A "FRIEND"
